Trade/Device Name(s): Virtuoso™ System for IHC PR (1E2) using the VENTANA iScan HT
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Virtuoso™ System for IHC PR (1E2) using the VENTANA iScan HT for digital slide scanning and qualitative detection of PR protein in breast cancer tissue
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic use as an aid to the pathologist in the qualitative detection of progesterone receptor (PR) protein in formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded normal and neoplastic tissue from breast cancer patients for whom endocrine treatment is being considered, in conjunction with CONFIRM™ anti-Progesterone Receptor (PR) (1E2) Rabbit Monoclonal Primary Antibody assay; not the sole basis for treatment
